TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider
Public Class MenuDesigner Inherits HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了分层菜单 Web 服务器控件。The class provides a hierarchical menu Web server control. 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源描述关联代码控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，被保存到标记的设计时控件并将其添加到网页上的现有标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup and added to the existing markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持可视化设计器中的控件。The class provides design-time support for controls in a visual designer. 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 属性返回的格式设置以在中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. 属性返回的模板的关联的模板组集合控件。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法获取在任何标记是为可用的设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available. 方法提供了在发生错误时的设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法将绑定关联到设计时数据源的控件。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source. 方法构造可在关联的控件的设计时使用的示例数据源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyMenu`类。The example derives the `MyMenu` class from the . `MyMenu`类是一份。The `MyMenu` class is a copy of the . 该示例还从`MyMenuDesigner`类类，，然后将应用属性，则为`MyMenuDesigner`上`MyMenu`类。The example also derives the `MyMenuDesigner` class from the class, and then applies a attribute for the `MyMenuDesigner` on the `MyMenu` class. `The MyMenuDesigner` 重写了下面成员：`The MyMenuDesigner` overrides the following members: - 方法，以便绘制控件以使其范围更明显橙色的虚线边框。The method to draw an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 方法来生成标记为包含错误消息，从而以红色呈现时，占位符显示为粗体文本。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 来生成标记为包含一条消息，指示定义无菜单项的占位符。The to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains a message indicating that no menu items are defined. - 方法会引发异常，如果不是关联的控件`MyMenu`对象。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果下列条件之一为 true，方法清除属性，然后调用基方法：If one of the following conditions is true, the method clears the property, and then calls the base method: - 属性不是`null`或空字符串 ("")。The property is not `null` or an empty string (""). - 属性不为 `null`。The property is not `null`. - 集合包含一个或多个元素。The collection contains one or more elements. `dataBoundControl`参数是与此设计器或一份该控件相关联的控件。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法将设计时数据源绑定到关联控件，然后调用方法，使控件来生成其静态视图和动态视图标记。The method calls the method to bind the design-time data source to the associated control, and then the calls the method to cause the control to generate its static-view and dynamic-view markup. 返回当前视图的标记。The returns the markup for the current view. 如果未定义的当前视图，调用基方法。If the current view is not defined, the calls the base method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法从派生的控件的外观更改控件在设计时。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 该示例将绘制控件以使其范围更明显，橙色的虚线边框，如果的控件的属性是或值。The example draws an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the control is the or value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#4)]

summary.span: 如果没有以其他方式提供标记，则获取在设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含在设计图面上呈现到占位符的标记文本。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为指定的占位符生成标记控制名称和消息，指示你要集合编辑器用于添加项。The method generates the markup for a placeholder that specifies the control name and a message instructing you to use the collection editor to add items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法从派生的控件的外观更改类在设计时。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例生成标记为包含一条消息，指示无菜单项定义的关联控件的占位符。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes a message indicating that no menu items are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#5)]

span.span: The object that was thrown.

summary.span: 如果发生了错误，提供在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含发生错误后在设计时呈现关联 的标记。

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成呈现错误设计时标记控件作为占位符包含的类型名称、 控件名称和描述错误的消息。The method generates markup that renders the error design-time control as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and messages describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法从派生的控件的外观更改类在设计时。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例为一个占位符，包括错误消息，从而以红色、 粗体文本呈现生成标记。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 构造设计时使用的关联控件的示例数据源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source to use at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 的对象，以作为关联 的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the to use as a data source for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过构造的示例数据源方法具有空路径的多个根菜单项。The sample data source that is constructed by the method has several root menu items with empty paths. 此示例使用数据源在设计时如果无菜单项定义的关联控件和菜单如果无法绑定到数据源。This sample data source is used at design time if no menu items are defined for the associated control and if the menu cannot be bound to a data source.

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法后其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器或一份该控件相关联的控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法更改派生自的控件行为类在设计时。The overridden method changes the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 本示例将引发异常，如果不是关联的控件`MyMenu`对象。The example throws an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control.

value.span: ，其中为 中的每个模板包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以获取对象基属性。The property gets a object from the base property. 然后将它添加到对象名为"`ItemTemplates`"包含两个名为"StaticItemTemplate"和"DynamicItemTemplate"的对象。It then adds to the a object named "`ItemTemplates`" that contains two objects named "StaticItemTemplate" and "DynamicItemTemplate". 属性返回这给调用方。The property returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器应使用关联控件的副本还是应使用控件本身来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a copy of the associated control or use the control itself to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终是`true`，该设计器使用包含一份关联的控件控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制不影响任何持久性对象。The control does not affect any persistence for the object. 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，该设计器使用关联对象自身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改保存到页标记源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated object itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control are persisted to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否将控件标记具有类级别其值属性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
